name: EPA_CODED_REFS
description: This table holds the coded references used for electronic prior authorization questions.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REF_CODE
columns.description: This item holds the code for an electronic prior authorization coded reference.

columns.name: REF_CODE_QUALIFIER_ID
columns.description: This item holds the qualifier for an electronic prior authorization coded reference.

columns.name: REF_CODE_QUALIFIER_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: REF_CODE_SYS_VER
columns.description: This item holds the code system version for an electronic prior authorization coded reference.

columns.name: REF_CODE_DESC
columns.description: This item holds the description for an electronic prior authorization coded reference.
